gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Clippers 111, Nuggets 102
gameRecap.excerpt: The Clippers defeated the Nuggets, 111-102. Paul George led the way with 25 points and eight rebounds for the Clippers, with James Harden adding 20 points and 11 assists in the victory. Nikola Jokic tallied 22 points, 15 rebounds, and 10 assists for the Nuggets in the losing effort. The Clippers improve to 10-10 in the regular season, while the Nuggets fall to 14-8.
